lead_paragraph: World number one Novak Djokovic is looking forward to playing on his favored hardcourt surface at the Rogers Cup in Toronto, but the Serb urged caution as he returns to action for the first time since his shock Wimbledon exit.
snippet: World number one Novak Djokovic is looking forward to playing on his favored hardcourt surface at the Rogers Cup in Toronto, but the Serb urged caution as he returns to action for the first time since his shock Wimbledon exit....

headline.main: Rejuvenated Djokovic Happy to Be Back on Hard Courts
headline.print_headline: Rejuvenated Djokovic Happy to Be Back on Hard Courts
